data.text: @BrighouseCathy Hi Catherine, I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Would you mind sending us a DM with the booking details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jay

@MadLatham Hi Maddie, thanks for sharing your experience with us. We take feedback such as yours seriously and would like to look into the issue you’ve raised. Please DM us with your booking info and we can get started. - Leslie

@SWGame Hi Jason, I understand it’s upsetting having to pay for excess baggage at the airport. Your carry-on allowance is separate from your checked baggage allowance - which means there are still excess baggage fees if you go over the carry-on weight limit. Thanks - Jaya

data.text: @slowlifetassie Hi David, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change.  If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, you may DM us with your booking details. Thanks – Jay
@remissiopaul Hi Paul, we’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please PM us and key in the code JQINV585? Thanks – Vi
@KarinNarita_ I understand your situation Karin. Can you send us a DM with your booking reference  to assist you further? Thanks - Vi

@KarinNarita_ Hi Karin, We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We'd love the chance to check this further for you. Thanks - Norine

data.text: @hey_Dingo Hey Manrish, thanks for your tweet. We're excited to welcome you on board tomorrow. See you soon! :) - Chichi

@LordofAustralia Hey there, sorry to hear about your experience. Our seating is designed to industry standards – but we understand there’s not always heaps of room for our taller passengers. We appreciate your feedback and have passed it onto our management team. Thanks – Chichi

@blu_boys Hi BB, Sorry to hear there were changes on your flights. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Just feel free to send us a DM here so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Norine

data.text: @elisemackey_ Hi Elise. Thank you for reaching out, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a Direct Message. - Dan

data.text: @cnewman89_ Hi Chris, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Please DM us with your booking details so we can check for option and assist. Thanks - Jay

data.text: @YahyaHadi05 Hi Yahya. I hope you can appreciate that the Social Media team don't have the capacity to call passengers. If you'd like to speak to someone you may call us at 131 538. Alternatively, you may send us a DM so we can look into this and assist. Thanks - Jay
@YahyaHadi05 Hi Yahya, I appreciate how frustrating this is to you. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can assist you? Thanks - Bree
@amanda_furber That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Amanda. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Leslie

@TobiSkovron Hi Tobi, I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience - we’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver, so we’d like to look into this further. Would you mind sending us a DM? Thanks - Jaya
@bee3105 Hi Bee, sorry to hear about the flight time change. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Leslie
@theaveragepunt Hi @theaveragepunt. Thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with the details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this and assist. – Jay
@begoodjohnny007 Hi John, We know this can be really frustrating. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@hessica_ann Hi Jess. I'm sorry to hear that you had to pay a fee at the gate. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info so we can look into this? Thanks - Jay
@OutriggerWaikik Noted 👀😉

@april_atteridge I can sense your disappointment with the fares, April. Prices aren’t static – they are subject to availability and can change. Usually, as ticket prices sell and the plane fills up, the price of the flight will increase. -Jen
@lauraaaanne18 Hi Laura, I appreciate your interest in this route, as we currently checking our network on a daily basis you can check any updates on our websites. Thanks -Lee

data.text: @brooke_khaki Hi Brooke, I'm sorry this has impacted your travel plans. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Leslie
@BrodieHarper Hi Brodie, great to hear you're keen to get over to Hawaii 🌴✈️ We've passed this onto our networks team... Though Singapore THEN Hawaii doesn't sound all bad does it? 😉 - Jay

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar
urls.description: Chat with one of our friendly Jetstar customer service

data.text: @djterrigal Hi Doug, I appreciate how upsetting this is to you. It is always best to always check our Travel Alerts page (https://t.co/h1hw9foFSI), so you can be directed to the relevant government websites for the latest updates about travel advisories and requirements. Thanks - Bree

@xsvetac Fares are not held for you until we’ve received your payment, Rose. With so many people on our website, another passenger may beat you to the fare you were hoping to buy. We know this can be really upsetting and hopefully you can take advantage of another sale soon. Thanks – Bree
@MissAnonFatale We love Thailand too Kylie! Hopefully it wont be much longer before you can get back for a visit ✈️🌏 – Vi

@freshwatersean Hi Sean, I’m sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. You may try to clear or delete the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need further assistance. Thanks - Norine
@theNatElizabeth Hey Natalie, our team are always open to new ideas to see how we can improve. We'll be sure to pass your feedback on. Thanks- Kauri
@theNatElizabeth Hi Nat. Thanks for your feedback. We’re sure there will be another sale you can take advantage of soon. Thanks – Vi
@PostRaceExpert Hi there, I'm sorry to hear you're having difficulty adding your voucher to My Wallet. Can you send us a DM so we can look further into this? Thanks - Bree

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Need someone to speak to? Take a look at our list of contacts to find the number that is most relevant to your location. View contact numbers now.

data.text: @LannaMaw Hi Lanna, you can find the list of our contact numbers here: https://t.co/QN7SqcD4t7 Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @benjiman1983 Hi Benny, glad to have you flying with us! Feel free to go through our Holidays page to check out flights and hotel accommodations for your booking: https://t.co/HU6mzVRM0o. You can also see some touristy recommendations there. :) Cheers! - Bree

@keatonhj Hi @keatonhj. Thanks for reaching out, sale starts today Monday, 25 October 2021 @12:00 AEDT and ends 25 October 2021 @ 23:59 AEDT.  You could check the sale page for a different route or date and try again. - Dan
@LannaMaw Hi Lanna, thanks for reaching out. You can call our Telephone reservations team at 131-538 or send us a DM here so we can assist you with this. Thanks - Jaya

@mowhere Hi Mowhere, we know how inconvenient canceled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible, I apologize if you were not notified about this and we'd like to look this up for you. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? -Lee

@MaximeCordeil Hi Maxime, I appreciate you're having difficulty checking your correct baggage allowance. Can you send us a DM with your Jetstar booking reference and full name, so we can look into your booking further? Thanks - Bree
@CryptoCornPop Hi there, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Would you mind sending us a PM so we can look into your options? Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @CryptoCornPop Hey, thanks for your tweet. As of now we have no flights yet to Honolulu. I would advise to check the website here from time to time for updates: https://t.co/JIS34me0em. Thanks - Chichi
@nick_spurway Hi Nick, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with the specific flight route? Thanks - Leslie
@gruffyruff Hi Gruffy. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? Thanks - Jay

@PeetersSheena Hi Sheena, sorry to hear your flight is impacted by lock-down. We understand that border restrictions continue to evolve. Please send us a DM so we can look into this further and assist. Thanks - Jay

@PeetersSheena Hi Sheena, I appreciate the concern. Don't worry, flights that are cancelled or affected by border restriction changes are always eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of the booking. Terms and Conditions apply. Thanks - Norine
@owrangle Hi @owrangle. I'm sorry to hear that you're not happy with the refund process. We’d like to look into this for you. Could you please DM us with your booking details? Thanks - Jay

@iamdavidrichter Hi David, Sorry to hear you're having trouble using your voucher. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM here? Thanks - Norine
@GhostPres Hi there. Thanks for letting us know about this and sorry for the confusion. I'll make sure to pass it on to the team for improvement. Thanks - Jaya
@Damienfinette1 Hi there, I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your credit voucher yet. Please send us a DM. We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya
@luke73b Hi Luke. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@ledmunds21 That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Luke – and we’re sure Paula will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! :) – Bree
@maiacowell Hi Maia, we’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM us with your booking details so we can assist? Thanks – Jay
@RyleighKjorsvik Hi Sassy, kitchen utensils, tools, and other items with sharp edges or points are prohibited to be carried onboard. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @RyleighKjorsvik Hi Sassy, thanks for reaching out. You can check the list of the items that are permitted to bring on board here: https://t.co/daBenSqRn1. Thanks - Jaya

urls.title: Contact us: Lost, damaged and delayed baggage | Jetstar
urls.description: Has your baggage been lost, damaged or delayed? Find out more information on what you need to do before leaving the airport and how you can make a claim.

data.text: @chewy101070 Hi Matt, our baggage team are best placed to assist with this! For more info and speak with them directly, visit https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Hope that helps. - Dan
@chewy101070 Hi Matt, sorry to hear that. She may inform a staff member at the Jetstar Baggage Counter or Service Desk at the airport about the laptop that was left onboard. Thanks - Leslie
@taliaualiitia Hi, @taliaualiitia. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. We'd like to look into this for you. Can you send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan
@YvetteDAth That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Yvette – and we’re sure that our Cabin Crews on JQ-888 flight will love to hear this. We’ll pass it on! – Jaya

@BecCotton Hi Minnie, I can tell you're really upset with the situation and that doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Your feedback is essential for our improvement. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need further assistance. Thanks - Norine

@yambaman1 Hi Blueboy, sorry to hear you're not able to take advantage of the sale – We know travels a bit tricky right now for some of us, keep your eyes peeled though with our available sale on our website https://t.co/bIy0fzEAJu. Thanks - Jay

data.text: @natty7722 Hi there, we know extra costs can be frustrating when you’re planning to travel. We’d like to check this further for you and see what we can do. Please send us a DM. Thanks - Jaya
@DallasSmith666 Thanks for sending the screenshot Reginald. Kindly send us a DM to assist you further. Thanks - Chichi
@DallasSmith666 Hi Reginald, would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. - Leslie
@Doug38957082 Hey Francesca, we'd like to discuss your voucher query further through DM. Thanks - Chichi

@Doug38957082 Hi Francesca, thanks for getting back to us. If your booking is eligible for a refund, we would always refund it back to your original mode of payment. If you need to discuss a specific booking, DM us. We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further.  Thanks – Jaya
@Doug38957082 Hi Francesca, I understand your situation. Please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name to assist you further. Thanks - Chichi
@DallasSmith666 Hi Reginald, sorry to hear that you're encountering issues on Club Jetstar. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Thanks – Leslie
@Freckballs Hi Becky, I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your credit voucher yet. Please send us a DM so we can check this further for you. Thanks - Jaya

@Tiaan28817617 Hi Tiaan, Clearly, this is important to you. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@sallykenney Hi Sally. Sorry to hear that you're having a problem with the "Apply Now"  button. You may apply for the Price Beat Guarantee here: https://t.co/BEe3Qt5CIM. Thanks - Chichi

data.text: @jenetwit Hi Jenet, I understand that you would like to cancel your flights now, however, our options at the moment are available for customers with imminent travel. You can keep across the situation by checking our Travel Alerts here: https://t.co/tZPZ7wzdp1 Thanks - Leslie

@RS_Ashleigh Hi Ashleigh, sorry to hear that. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks - Leslie
@GrovesJenna Hey Jenna. Vouchers are multi-use and can be used across multiple bookings. Any outstanding credit from one booking can be used towards another. Hope this helps. Thanks - Chichi

@AdelaideBarmies Hi there, we're so glad that our Cabin crews on the flight JQ975 were on hand to help make your flight experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!) – Jaya

@TrevTrevor Hi @TrevTrevor. Thank you for reaching out, if there aren’t any sale fares left on the dates you are searching, you could check the sale page for a different route or date and try again. Thanks – Dan

@keatonhj Hey Keaton, sorry to hear you're having trouble finding our $22 fares - the website may be struggling right now. If there aren't any $22 fares showing up, we recommend you check the sale page for a different route or date to get the best price. Thanks – Jaya
@sammiedude88 Hi Sam, I understand this must be upsetting for you. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@iamshanejameson That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Shane – and we’re sure Lee will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! Thanks - Jay
@iamshanejameson I understand this has been very inconvenient for you. Can you send us a DM with full details and let us assist you in checking this out. Thanks! -Lee

urls.title: Cheap Flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Famous low airfares. Great destinations. Discover our domestic and international network across Australia, New Zealand, Asia and the Pacific.

data.text: @vii_lauren Sorry if you felt it that way, Lauren. 20% discounts offer on checked baggage is available when a logged-in member is booking a new flight at https://t.co/4eYTB3X1JH. You may want to try it. Should you need further assistance, feel free to DM us here. Thanks - Norine

@vii_lauren Hi Lauren, We want to be able to keep offering low-cost flights and providing our customers with a choice. That’s why we give our customers the choice to purchase extra baggage if they need it, rather than adding it to the cost of the ticket itself. - Lee

@amitchakravarty Hi @amitchakravarty, I'm sorry if you haven't receive your refund yet. We’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Please send us DM for us to help you further about it. Thanks. – Ryan

urls.title: Contact Us | Jetstar Holidays
urls.description: Visit our customer service page to get in touch via email, call or request a callback.

data.text: @PJW316 Hi PJ, I appreciate you are having trouble on the website and the app. As this is a Holidays team booking, you may reach out to them directly and they will assist you. You can do so here - https://t.co/q752WvRFO4. Thanks - Bree

@FaunMcGowan Hi @FaunMcGowan, I know how important this is for you. You can definitely bring your own food on board with you (as long as it all gets eaten on the plane). Enjoy your flight! Thanks - Ryan

@bargey00 Hi Nathan, I see how difficult that you're getting an error to add baggage via Jetstar App. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Ralph.
@MadelineHealey Hi Madeline, Clearly, this is important for you. Would you mind sending us a PM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@MickKavera There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience with us. Thanks for sharing, Mick! - Norine
@MickKavera That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Mick  –  We’ll pass it on! – Dan

@Meowcy91 HI NerdGrl. I'm sorry to hear that you're not happy with your outcome. If you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM. – Jay

@RKO_7_ Hi @RKO_7_, I'm sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We'd like to check your refund status here. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya

@Bradley_Saint_B Hi Bradley, I understand that you now prefer a refund rather than a voucher. If you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. Thanks – Leslie

@_good_grief_990 Hi @_good_grief_990, Great idea! Our team are always open to new ideas and we evaluate our schedules all the time to see how we can improve. You may visit our website on this link https://t.co/V04lkiGPiK to check the flight that you prefer, hope that helps. - Dan
@ohh_ell That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, @ohh_ell – and we’re sure Catherine and Gabby will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on to them! –  Ralph

@OzCon100 Hello Lucius, If you’ve already opted for a voucher, we’re unable to convert it to cash. Cash refunds are only available in specific circumstances. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you may send us a DM with complete details. Thanks -Lee
@mskarinalouise Hi Karina, I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks - Leslie
@CryptoCornPop Hi, @CryptoCornPop. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan

@lesley_morgan25 Hi Lesley. Thanks for reaching out, the website is definitely still taking bookings and that’s where you’ll get the cheapest fares! We recommend clearing your cookies and cache, then trying again. – Dan

@DaniloCryptoo Hi Danilo, thanks for reaching out. We do not have any physical email address for this but you can send us a DM here - we’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Thanks - Norine
@thetkennedy Hi @thetkennedy, we know how inconvenient canceled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Thanks. - Ralph
